Publications

Lewis, W., & Eetemadi, S. (2013). Dramatically reducing training data size through vocabulary saturation. In Proceedings of the Eighth Workshop on Statistical Machine Translation (pp. 281–291).

Eetemadi, S., & Radha, H. (2010). Effects of Parallel Corpus Selection on Statistical Machine Translation Quality. In Pacific Northwest Regional Natural Language Processing Workshop.

Eetemadi, S., & Toutanova, K. (2014). Asymmetric Features of Human Generated Translation. In Emperical Methods in Natural Language Processing.

Eetemadi, S., & Van Eaton, J. (2005). A Hybrid Network Platform for Collaborative Applications. In Workshop on Advanced Collaborative Environments.

Pahud, M., Aikawa, T., Wilson, A. D., Benko, H., Eetemadi, S., & Chakravarty, A. M. (2011). Translating text on a surface computing device.

Eetemadi, S. (2005). Inter-partition Networking for Overlay Multicast. Michigan State University. Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering.

Eetemadi, S., & Toutanova, K. (2015). Detecting translation direction: a cross-domain study. In Proceedings of the 2015 Conference of the North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Student Research Workshop (pp. 103–109).

Eetemadi, S., Lewis, W., Toutanova, K., & Radha, H. (2015). Survey of data-selection methods in statistical machine translation. Machine Translation, 29(3-4), 189–223.

Eetemadi, S. (2016). Data analysis and selection for statistical machine translation (PhD thesis). Michigan State University.
